code::call_function.desc:
**Name:** Call Function\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Calls a function code string.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::call_function("function_name", {"args":`args`});

//Or dry by keywords

code::call_function(function_name="function_name", args={"args":`args`});
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                 | Type            | Description                                                |
| :------------ | :--------- | :---------------------------------------------------- |
| function_name      | Text            | Function Name                                              |
| args               | Dictionary      | creative_plus.action.call_function.argument.args.name      |

code::call_exception.desc:
**Name:** Call Error\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Calls a specific error with the specified ID and message.\
**Additional info:**\
  It is recommended to use this in the Catch Error action.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::call_exception("id", "message", "ERROR");

//Or dry by keywords

code::call_exception(id="id", message="message", type="ERROR");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID           | Type                       | Description        |
| :------ | :-------------------- | :------------ |
| id           | Text                       | Error ID           |
| message      | Text                       | Error Message      |
| type         | Marker                     | Error Type         |
|              | **ERROR** - Error          |                    |
|              | **FATAL** - Fatal          |                    |
|              | **WARNING** - Warning      |                    |

code::dummy.desc:
**Name:** ...\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** ...

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::dummy();
```

code::break.desc:
**Name:** Stop Sequence\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Stops the current code block sequence. Any code after this block will not be executed.\
**Additional info:**\
  If the action was used in functions, it will stop the parent line where the function was called.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::break();
```

code::return_function.desc:
**Name:** Return From Function\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Stops the current sequence of code blocks in a function and returns to the function call block.\
**Additional info:**\
  Returns up to the current function call block in the parent row.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::return_function();
```

code::skip_iteration.desc:
**Name:** Skip Iteration\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Skip one iteration in the current iteration.\
**Work_with:**\
  With repetitions

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::skip_iteration();
```

code::stop_repeat.desc:
**Name:** Stop Repeat\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Completely stops the current repeat.\
**Work_with:**\
  Repeat

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::stop_repeat();
```

code::wait.desc:
**Name:** Wait\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Pauses the current sequence of code blocks for a certain amount of time.\
**Additional info:**\
  Minimum delay is 1 tick; in Tiki mode, only whole numbers can be set.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
code::wait(1, "MINUTES");

//Or dry by keywords

code::wait(duration=1, time_unit="MINUTES");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID             | Type                       | Description        |
| :-------- | :-------------------- | :------------ |
| duration       | Number                     | Wait Duration      |
| time_unit      | Marker                     | Time Unit          |
|                | **MINUTES** - Minutes      |                    |
|                | **SECONDS** - Seconds      |                    |
|                | **TICKS** - Ticks          |                    |

controller::async_run.desc:
**Name:** Run On Separate Thread\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Runs the code inside the pistons on a separate thread, which can reduce load. Undo and redo events will not work after pistons.\
**Additional info:**\
  Some actions inside pistons may not work.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
controller::async_run(){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

controller::isolated_selection.desc:
**Name:** creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.name\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.description\
**Additional info:**\
  creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.additional_information.info\
  creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.additional_information.you_can_use_return_with_for_each_in_selection

**Usage example:**
```justcode
controller::isolated_selection("DEFAULT"){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}

//Or dry by keywords

controller::isolated_selection(selection_mode="DEFAULT"){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                  | Type                                                                                                              | Description                                                                          |
| :------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| selection_mode      | Marker                                                                                                            | creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.argument.selection_mode.name      |
|                     | **DEFAULT** - creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.argument.selection_mode.enum.default.name        |                                                                                      |
|                     | **CURRENT** - creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.argument.selection_mode.enum.current.name        |                                                                                      |
|                     | **EMPTY** - creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.argument.selection_mode.enum.empty.name            |                                                                                      |
|                     | **FOR_EACH** - creative_plus.action.controller_isolated_selection.argument.selection_mode.enum.for_each.name      |                                                                                      |

entity::attach_lead.desc:

**Usage example:**
```justcode

//Or dry by keywords

entity::attach_lead(name_or_uuid="name_or_uuid", location=location(0,0,0,0,0));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                | Type          | Description              |
| :----------- | :------- | :------------------ |
| name_or_uuid      | Text          | Entity name or UUID      |
| location          | Location      | Fence Location           |

**Name:** Give Potion Effect\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Gives the selected effects to the creature. **Usage example:** ```justcode entity::give_potion_effects([potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], "FALSE", "FALSE", "AMBIENT"); //Or dry by keywords entity::give_potion_effects(potions=[potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], overwrite="FALSE", show_icon="FALSE", particle_mode="AMBIENT"); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :------------ | :------------------------ | :---------------------------------------------------------- | | potions | Array\[Potion\] | Effects to Give
The argument supports list decomposition | | overwrite | Marker | Overwrite existing effects | | | **FALSE** - None | | | | **TRUE** - Yes | | | show_icon | Marker | Show Effect Icon | | | **FALSE** - None | | | | **TRUE** - Yes | | | particle_mode | Marker | Give Particles | | | **AMBIENT** - Transparent | | | | **NONE** - None | | | | **REGULAR** - Yes | |

entity::launch_forward.desc:
**Name:** Launch Forward\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Launches an entity forward or backward in the direction it is facing based on its power.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
entity::launch_forward(1, "FALSE", "YAW");

//Or dry by keywords

entity::launch_forward(power=1, increment="FALSE", launch_axis="YAW");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID               | Type                              | Description                   |
| :---------- | :--------------------------- | :----------------------- |
| power            | Number                            | Forward Force                 |
| increment        | Marker                            | Consider current inertia      |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disabled              |                               |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enabled                |                               |
| launch_axis      | Marker                            | Launch Axis                   |
|                  | **YAW** - Horizontal Only         |                               |
|                  | **YAW_AND_PITCH** - All Axis      |                               |

**Name:** Launch Projectile\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Launch a projectile from an entity's location.

**Usage example:**

```justcode
//Or dry by keywords

entity::launch_projectile(projectile=item("stick"), location=location(0,0,0,0,0), name="name", speed=1, inaccuracy=2, trail=particle("fire"));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID              | Type                 | Description                                                        |
| :--------- | :-------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------ |
| projectile      | Item                 | Projectile to Launch                                               |
| location        | Location             | Launch Location                                                    |
| name            | Text                 | Projectile Name                                                    |
| speed           | Number               | Projectile Speed                                                   |
| inaccuracy      | Number               | Projectile deflection (0 to make the projectile fly straight)      |
| trail           | Particle Effect      | The trail the projectile will leave                                |

world::hide_event_message.desc:

**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Removes the message from the event that triggered this code.\
**Work_with:**\

  Player Death Event

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::hide_event_message("FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::hide_event_message(hide="FALSE");
```

| ID        | Type                  | Description       |
| :--- | :--------------- | :----------- |
| hide      | Marker                | Hide Message      |
|           | **FALSE** - None      |                   |
|           | **TRUE** - Yes        |                   |

world::launch_firework.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Firework\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Launches firework at the specified location.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::launch_firework(item("stick"), location(0,0,0,0,0), "DIRECTIONAL", "FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::launch_firework(firework=item("stick"), location=location(0,0,0,0,0), movement="DIRECTIONAL", instant="FALSE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type                               | Description             |
| :------- | :---------------------------- | :----------------- |
| firework      | Item                               | Firework to Create      |
| location      | Location                           | Creation Location       |
| movement      | Marker                             | Move                    |
|               | **DIRECTIONAL** - Directional      |                         |
|               | **UPWARDS** - Upwards              |                         |
| instant       | Marker                             | Instant Explosion       |
|               | **FALSE** - None                   |                         |
|               | **TRUE** - Yes                     |                         |

world::launch_projectile.desc:
**Name:** Launch Projectile\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Launches a projectile at the specified location.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::launch_projectile(item("stick"), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, 2, "custom_name", particle("fire"));

//Or dry by keywords

world::launch_projectile(projectile=item("stick"), location=location(0,0,0,0,0), speed=1, inaccuracy=2, custom_name="custom_name", trail=particle("fire"));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID               | Type                 | Description                                                           |
| :---------- | :-------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------- |
| projectile       | Item                 | Projectile to Launch                                                  |
| location         | Location             | Launch Location                                                       |
| speed            | Number               | Projectile Speed                                                      |
| inaccuracy       | Number               | Projectile deflection (0 to keep the projectile flying straight)      |
| custom_name      | Text                 | Projectile Name                                                       |
| trail            | Particle Effect      | The trail the projectile will leave                                   |

world::replace_blocks_in_region.desc:
**Name:** Replace Blocks in Region\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Replaces blocks with others in the selected region. **Usage example:** ```justcode world::replace_blocks_in_region(["minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]", "minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"], location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), "minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"); //Or dry by keywords world::replace_blocks_in_region(old_block=["minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]", "minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"], pos_1=location(0,0,0,0,0), pos_2=location(0,0,0,0,0), new_block="minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :-------- | :------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------ | | old_block | Array\[Block\] | Blocks to Replace

world::send_web_request.desc:
**Name:** Send Web Request\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sends a web request with the selected method and body to the selected URL.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::send_web_request("url", "content_body", {"headers":`headers`}, "DELETE", "APPLICATION_JSON");

//Or dry by keywords

world::send_web_request(url="url", content_body="content_body", headers={"headers":`headers`}, request_type="DELETE", content_type="APPLICATION_JSON");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                | Type                                                                                              | Description                                                           |
| :----------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------- |
| url               | Text                                                                                              | URL                                                                   |
| content_body      | Text                                                                                              | Request Body                                                          |
| headers           | Dictionary                                                                                        | creative_plus.action.game_send_web_request.argument.headers.name      |
| request_type      | Marker                                                                                            | Request Type                                                          |
|                   | **DELETE** - DELETE                                                                               |                                                                       |
|                   | **GET** - GET                                                                                     |                                                                       |
|                   | **HEAD** - HEAD                                                                                   |                                                                       |
|                   | **PATCH** - creative_plus.action.game_send_web_request.argument.request_type.enum.patch.name      |                                                                       |
|                   | **POST** - POST                                                                                   |                                                                       |
|                   | **PUT** - PUT                                                                                     |                                                                       |
| content_type      | Marker                                                                                            | Media Request Type                                                    |
|                   | **APPLICATION_JSON** - JSON (application/json)                                                    |                                                                       |
|                   | **TEXT_PLAIN** - Plain Text (text/plain)                                                          |                                                                       |

**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the color of sign text at the selected location.\
**Work_with:**\
  Signs

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_sign_text_color(location(0,0,0,0,0), "ALL", "BLACK", "FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_sign_text_color(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), side="ALL", sign_text_color="BLACK", glowing="FALSE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                   | Type                             | Description        |
| :-------------- | :-------------------------- | :------------ |
| location             | Location                         | Sign location      |
| side                 | Marker                           | Sign Side          |
|                      | **ALL** - All                    |                    |
|                      | **BACK** - Back                  |                    |
|                      | **FRONT** - Front                |                    |
| sign_text_color      | Marker                           | Sign Color         |
|                      | **BLACK** - Black                |                    |
|                      | **BLUE** - Blue                  |                    |
|                      | **BROWN** - Brown                |                    |
|                      | **CYAN** - Cyan                  |                    |
|                      | **GRAY** - Grey                  |                    |
|                      | **GREEN** - Green                |                    |
|                      | **LIGHT_BLUE** - Blue            |                    |
|                      | **LIGHT_GRAY** - Light Gray      |                    |
|                      | **LIME** - Lime                  |                    |
|                      | **MAGENTA** - Magenta            |                    |
|                      | **ORANGE** - Orange              |                    |
|                      | **PINK** - Pink                  |                    |
|                      | **PURPLE** - Purple              |                    |
|                      | **RED** - Red                    |                    |
|                      | **WHITE** - White                |                    |
|                      | **YELLOW** - Yellow              |                    |
| glowing              | Marker                           | Text Glow          |
|                      | **FALSE** - Disable              |                    |
|                      | **TRUE** - Enable                |                    |

world::set_sign_waxed.desc:
**Name:** Set Sign Waxed\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the waxedness of the sign at the selected location.\
**Work_with:**\
  Signs

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_sign_waxed(location(0,0,0,0,0), "FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_sign_waxed(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), waxed="FALSE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type                     | Description              |
| :------- | :------------------ | :------------------ |
| location      | Location                 | Sign Waxed Location      |
| waxed         | Marker                   | Waxed                    |
|               | **FALSE** - Disable      |                          |
|               | **TRUE** - Enable        |                          |

world::set_spawner_entity.desc:
**Name:** Set Spawner Entity\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the entity that spawns near a Spawner.\
**Work_with:**\
  Spawner

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_spawner_entity(location(0,0,0,0,0), item("stick"));

//Or from the object

location(0,0,0,0,0).set_spawner_entity(item("stick"));

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_spawner_entity(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), entity=item("stick"));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description           |
| :------- | :------- | :--------------- |
| location      | Location      | Spawner location      |
| entity        | Item          | Entity                |

world::set_gamerule.desc:
**Name:** Set World Gamerule\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets a specific game rule in the world.\
**Additional info:**\
  Leave the value argument empty to reset the gamerule to its default state.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_gamerule("DISABLE_RAIDS", "value");

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_gamerule(gamerule="DISABLE_RAIDS", value="value");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type                                                                                                                                                    | Description      |
| :------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------- |
| gamerule      | Marker                                                                                                                                                  | Gamerule         |
|               | **DISABLE_RAIDS** - disableRaids                                                                                                                        |                  |
|               | **DO_DAYLIGHT_CYCLE** - doDaylightCycle                                                                                                                 |                  |
|               | **DO_ENTITY_DROPS** - doEntityDrops                                                                                                                     |                  |
|               | **DO_FIRE_TICK** - doFireTick                                                                                                                           |                  |
|               | **DO_IMMEDIATE_RESPAWN** - doImmediateRespawn                                                                                                           |                  |
|               | **DO_INSOMNIA** - doInsomnia                                                                                                                            |                  |
|               | **DO_MOB_LOOT** - doMobLoot                                                                                                                             |                  |
|               | **DO_MOB_SPAWNING** - doMobSpawning                                                                                                                     |                  |
|               | **DO_PATROL_SPAWNING** - doPatrolSpawning                                                                                                               |                  |
|               | **DO_TILE_DROPS** - doTileDrops                                                                                                                         |                  |
|               | **DO_TRADER_SPAWNING** - doTraderSpawning                                                                                                               |                  |
|               | **DO_WEATHER_CYCLE** - doWeatherCycle                                                                                                                   |                  |
|               | **DROWNING_DAMAGE** - drowningDamage                                                                                                                    |                  |
|               | **FALL_DAMAGE** - fallDamage                                                                                                                            |                  |
|               | **FIRE_DAMAGE** - fireDamage                                                                                                                            |                  |
|               | **FORGIVE_DEAD_PLAYERS** - forgiveDeadPlayers                                                                                                           |                  |
|               | **KEEP_INVENTORY** - keepInventory                                                                                                                      |                  |
|               | **MOB_GRIEFING** - mobGriefing                                                                                                                          |                  |
|               | **PROJECTILES_CAN_BREAK_BLOCKS** - projectilesCanBreakBlocks                                                                                            |                  |
|               | **SHOW_DEATH_MESSAGES** - showDeathMessages                                                                                                             |                  |
|               | **NATURAL_REGENERATION** - naturalRegeneration                                                                                                          |                  |
|               | **UNIVERSAL_ANGER** - universalAnger                                                                                                                    |                  |
|               | **PLAYERS_SLEEPING_PERCENTAGE** - playersSleepingPercentage                                                                                             |                  |
|               | **REDUCED_DEBUG_INFO** - reducedDebugInfo                                                                                                               |                  |
|               | **FREEZE_DAMAGE** - freezeDamage                                                                                                                        |                  |
|               | **RANDOM_TICK_SPEED** - randomTickSpeed                                                                                                                 |                  |
|               | **MAX_ENTITY_CRAMMING** - maxEntityCramming                                                                                                             |                  |
|               | **SPAWN_RADIUS** - spawnRadius                                                                                                                          |                  |
|               | **LAVA_SOURCE_CONVERSION** - lavaSourceConversion                                                                                                       |                  |
|               | **WATER_SOURCE_CONVERSION** - waterSourceConversion                                                                                                     |                  |
|               | **TNT_EXPLOSION_DROP_DECAY** - tntExplosionDropDecay                                                                                                    |                  |
|               | **BLOCK_EXPLOSION_DROP_DECAY** - blockExplosionDropDecay                                                                                                |                  |
|               | **MOB_EXPLOSION_DROP_DECAY** - mobExplosionDropDecay                                                                                                    |                  |
|               | **DO_LIMITED_CRAFTING** - doLimitedCrafting                                                                                                             |                  |
|               | **PLAYERS_NETHER_PORTAL_DEFAULT_DELAY** - playersNetherPortalDefaultDelay                                                                               |                  |
|               | **PLAYERS_NETHER_PORTAL_CREATIVE_DELAY** - playersNetherPortalCreativeDelay                                                                             |                  |
|               | **SNOW_ACCUMULATION_HEIGHT** - snowAccumulationHeight                                                                                                   |                  |

world::set_world_simulation_distance.desc:
**Name:** Set World Simulation Distance\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the chunk simulation distance for the world.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_world_simulation_distance(1);

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_world_simulation_distance(distance=1);
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type        | Description                               |
| :------- | :----- | :----------------------------------- |
| distance      | Number      | Simulation Distance in Chunks (2-32)      |

world::set_world_time.desc:
**Name:** Set World Time\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the world time in ticks.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_world_time(1);

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_world_time(time=1);
```

**Arguments:**

| ID        | Type        | Description        |
| :--- | :----- | :------------ |
| time      | Number      | Time in ticks      |

world::set_world_weather.desc:
**Name:** Set World Weather\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Sets the world's weather for a certain amount of time.\
**Additional info:**\
  By default, if no duration is specified, the weather will not change.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::set_world_weather(1, "CLEAR");

//Or dry by keywords

world::set_world_weather(weather_duration=1, weather_type="CLEAR");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                    | Type                            | Description       |
| :--------------- | :------------------------- | :----------- |
| weather_duration      | Number                          | Duration          |
| weather_type          | Marker                          | Weather Type      |
|                       | **CLEAR** - Clear               |                   |
|                       | **RAINING** - Raining           |                   |
|                       | **THUNDER** - Thunderstorm      |                   |

world::spawn_armor_stand.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Armor Stand\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns an armor stand at the specified location.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::spawn_armor_stand(item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), location(0,0,0,0,0), "custom_name", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::spawn_armor_stand(helmet=item("stick"), chestplate=item("stick"), leggings=item("stick"), boots=item("stick"), right_hand=item("stick"), left_hand=item("stick"), location=location(0,0,0,0,0), custom_name="custom_name", gravity="FALSE", marker="FALSE", small="FALSE", show_arms="FALSE", base_plate="FALSE", invisible="FALSE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID               | Type                      | Description          |
| :---------- | :------------------- | :-------------- |
| helmet           | Item                      | Headgear             |
| chestplate       | Item                      | Chestplate           |
| leggings         | Item                      | Leggings             |
| boots            | Item                      | Boots                |
| right_hand       | Item                      | Right Hand Item      |
| left_hand        | Item                      | Left Hand Item       |
| location         | Location                  | Spawn Location       |
| custom_name      | Text                      | Stand name           |
| gravity          | Marker                    | Set Gravity          |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disable       |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enable         |                      |
| marker           | Marker                    | Marker Mode          |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disabled      |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enabled        |                      |
| small            | Marker                    | Make Small           |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disable       |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enable         |                      |
| show_arms        | Marker                    | Show Arms            |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disable       |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enable         |                      |
| base_plate       | Marker                    | Slab Display         |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disable       |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enable         |                      |
| invisible        | Marker                    | Invisible            |
|                  | **FALSE** - Disable       |                      |
|                  | **TRUE** - Enable         |                      |

world::spawn_block_display.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Block Display\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns a block renderer at the specified location

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::spawn_block_display(location(0,0,0,0,0), "custom_name", "minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]");

//Or dry by keywords

world::spawn_block_display(spawn_location=location(0,0,0,0,0), custom_name="custom_name", block="minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                  | Type          | Description         |
| :------------- | :------- | :------------- |
| spawn_location      | Location      | Spawn Location      |
| custom_name         | Text          | Name                |
| block               | Block         | Display Block       |

world::spawn_effect_cloud.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Effect Cloud\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Spawns a cloud of misty potion that infuses the effects of the entities in it. **Usage example:** ```justcode world::spawn_effect_cloud(location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, 2, [potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], particle("fire"), "custom_name"); //Or dry by keywords world::spawn_effect_cloud(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), duration=1, radius=2, effects=[potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], particle=particle("fire"), custom_name="custom_name"); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :---------- | :-------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | location | Location | Spawn Location | | duration | Number | Duration | | radius | Number | Cloud Radius | | effects | Array\[Potion\] | Potion Effects
The argument supports list decomposition | | particle | Particle Effect | Cloud Particles | | custom_name | Text | Name |

world::spawn_eye_of_ender.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Eye of Ender\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns an Eye of End at the target location that will move towards the target.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::spawn_eye_of_ender(location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, "custom_name", "DROP");

//Or dry by keywords

world::spawn_eye_of_ender(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), destination=location(0,0,0,0,0), lifespan=1, custom_name="custom_name", end_of_lifespan="DROP");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                   | Type                         | Description         |
| :-------------- | :---------------------- | :------------- |
| location             | Location                     | Spawn Location      |
| destination          | Location                     | Destination         |
| lifespan             | Number                       | Lifespan            |
| custom_name          | Text                         | Name                |
| end_of_lifespan      | Marker                       | At End              |
|                      | **DROP** - Drop an item      |                     |
|                      | **RANDOM** - Random          |                     |
|                      | **SHATTER** - Shatter        |                     |

world::spawn_falling_block.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Falling Block\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns a falling block at the specified location.


**Arguments:**

| ID                 | Type                  | Description         |
| :------------ | :--------------- | :------------- |
| block              | Block                 | Block to Spawn      |
| location           | Location              | Spawn Location      |
| name               | Text                  | Name                |
| should_expire      | Marker                | Must Vanish         |
|                    | **FALSE** - None      |                     |
|                    | **TRUE** - Yes        |                     |

|                  | **TRUE** - Enable        |                      |

world::spawn_item.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Item\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns an item at the specified location with the selected options.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::spawn_item(location(0,0,0,0,0), item("stick"), "custom_name", "FALSE", "FALSE", "FALSE");

//Or dry by keywords

world::spawn_item(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), item=item("stick"), custom_name="custom_name", can_mob_pickup="FALSE", can_player_pickup="FALSE", apply_motion="FALSE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                     | Type                  | Description                              |
| :---------------- | :--------------- | :---------------------------------- |
| location               | Location              | Spawn Location                           |
| item                   | Item                  | Item to Spawn                            |
| custom_name            | Text                  | Name                                     |
| can_mob_pickup         | Marker                | Can mobs pick up an item                 |
|                        | **FALSE** - None      |                                          |
|                        | **TRUE** - Yes        |                                          |
| can_player_pickup      | Marker                | Whether players can pick up an item      |
|                        | **FALSE** - None      |                                          |
|                        | **TRUE** - Yes        |                                          |
| apply_motion           | Marker                | Set Item Motion on Spawn                 |
|                        | **FALSE** - None      |                                          |
|                        | **TRUE** - Yes        |                                          |

world::spawn_lightning_bolt.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Lightning\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Spawns lightning at the specified location.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::spawn_lightning_bolt(location(0,0,0,0,0));

//Or dry by keywords

world::spawn_lightning_bolt(location=location(0,0,0,0,0));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description         |
| :------- | :------- | :------------- |
| location      | Location      | Spawn Location      |

world::spawn_mob.desc:
**Name:** Spawn Entity\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Spawns a mob at the specified location with the selected options. **Usage example:** ```justcode world::spawn_mob(item("stick"), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, "custom_name", [potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), item("stick"), "FALSE"); //Or dry by keywords world::spawn_mob(mob=item("stick"), location=location(0,0,0,0,0), health=1, custom_name="custom_name", potion_effects=[potion("slow_falling"), potion("slow_falling")], main_hand=item("stick"), helmet=item("stick"), chestplate=item("stick"), leggings=item("stick"), boots=item("stick"), off_hand=item("stick"), natural_equipment="FALSE"); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :------------------ | :-------------------------------------------------- | | mob | Item | Mob Type | | location | Location | Spawn Location | | health | Number | Amount of Health | | custom_name | Text | Name | | potion_effects | Array\[Potion\] | Effects
The argument supports list decomposition | | main_hand | Item | Main Hand Item | | helmet | Item | Headgear | | chestplate | Item | Chestplate | | leggings | Item | Leggings | | boots | Item | Boots | | off_hand | Item | Offhand Item | | natural_equipment | Marker | Standard Equipment | | | **FALSE** - Disable | | | | **TRUE** - Enable | |

The argument supports list decomposition | | merging_mode | Marker | Merge Text | | | **CONCATENATION** - Merge | | | | **SEPARATE_LINES** - Separate Lines | | | | **SPACES** - Space Separation | |

world::uncancel_event.desc:
**Name:** Uncancel Event\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Returns the cancellation of the event that triggered this code.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::uncancel_event();
```

world::update_block.desc:
**Name:** Update Adjacent Block\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Updates adjacent blocks at the specified location if the block is not air. The block on the location itself is not updated, but it can be updated from adjacent blocks.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
world::update_block(location(0,0,0,0,0));

//Or dry by keywords

world::update_block(location=location(0,0,0,0,0));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description      |
| :------- | :------- | :---------- |
| location      | Location      | Location         |

entity::in_area.desc:
**Name:** Inside Region\
**Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\
**Description:** Checks if an entity is in a certain region.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
if(entity::in_area(location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), "FALSE", "HITBOX", "CONTAINS")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}

//Or dry by keywords

if(entity::in_area(location_1=location(0,0,0,0,0), location_2=location(0,0,0,0,0), ignore_y_axis="FALSE", intersect_type="HITBOX", check_type="CONTAINS")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                  | Type                           | Description                 |
| :------------- | :------------------------ | :--------------------- |
| location_1          | Location                       | First corner of region      |
| location_2          | Location                       | Second Region Corner        |
| ignore_y_axis       | Marker                         | Ignore Y Axis               |
|                     | **FALSE** - Don't ignore       |                             |
|                     | **TRUE** - Ignore              |                             |
| intersect_type      | Marker                         | Intersection type           |
|                     | **HITBOX** - Hitbox            |                             |
|                     | **POINT** - Location           |                             |
| check_type          | Marker                         | Hitbox check type           |
|                     | **CONTAINS** - Contains        |                             |
|                     | **OVERLAPS** - Intersects      |                             |

world::container_has.desc:
**Name:** Container Has an Item\ **Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\ **Description:** Checks if a container at a specific location has certain items in its inventory. **Usage example:** ```justcode if(world::container_has([item("stick"), item("stick")], location(0,0,0,0,0), "ALL", "EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } //Or dry by keywords if(world::container_has(items=[item("stick"), item("stick")], location=location(0,0,0,0,0), check_mode="ALL", comparison_mode="EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :-------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | items | Array\[Item\] | Items to Check

world::sign_contains.desc:
**Name:** Sign Contains Text\ **Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\ **Description:** Checks if a sign at a given location contains the specified text. **Usage example:** ```justcode if(world::sign_contains(location(0,0,0,0,0), ["texts", "texts"], "ANY", "ALL", "ALL")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } //Or dry by keywords if(world::sign_contains(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), texts=["texts", "texts"], check_side="ANY", check_mode="ALL", lines="ALL")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :--------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------- | | location | Location | Sign location | | texts | Array\[Text\] | Text to check
The argument supports list decomposition | | check_side | Marker | Sign Side | | | **ANY** - Any | | | | **BACK** - Back | | | | **FRONT** - Front | | | check_mode | Marker | Comparison Type | | | **ALL** - creative_plus.action.if_game_sign_contains.argument.check_mode.enum.all.name | | | | **ANY** - creative_plus.action.if_game_sign_contains.argument.check_mode.enum.any.name | | | | **CONTAINS** - Content Compare | | | | **EQUALS** - Full Compare | | | lines | Marker | Lines to Compare | | | **ALL** - All Lines | | | | **ANY** - Any String | | | | **FIRST** - 1 line | | | | **FOURTH** - line 4 | | | | **SECOND** - 2 line | | | | **THIRD** - 3 line | |

player::has_input.desc:
**Name:** creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.name\
**Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\
**Description:** creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.description

**Usage example:**
```justcode
if(player::has_input("FORWARD")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}

//Or dry by keywords

if(player::has_input(input_type="FORWARD")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

**Arguments:**

| ID              | Type                                                                                                  | Description                                                            |
| :--------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| input_type      | Marker                                                                                                | creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.name      |
|                 | **FORWARD** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.forward.name          |                                                                        |
|                 | **BACKWARDS** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.backwards.name      |                                                                        |
|                 | **LEFT** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.left.name                |                                                                        |
|                 | **RIGHT** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.right.name              |                                                                        |
|                 | **JUMP** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.jump.name                |                                                                        |
|                 | **SNEAK** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.sneak.name              |                                                                        |
|                 | **SPRINT** - creative_plus.action.if_player_has_input.argument.input_type.enum.sprint.name            |                                                                        |

player::has_item.desc:
**Name:** Has an Item\ **Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\ **Description:** Checks if the player has an item in their inventory. **Usage example:** ```justcode if(player::has_item([item("stick"), item("stick")], "ALL", "EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } //Or dry by keywords if(player::has_item(items=[item("stick"), item("stick")], check_mode="ALL", comparison_mode="EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :-------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | items | Array\[Item\] | Items to Check
The argument supports list decomposition | | check_mode | Marker | Check Mode | | | **ALL** - All Items | | | | **ANY** - Any Item | | | comparison_mode | Marker | Comparison Mode | | | **EXACTLY** - Full Comparison | | | | **IGNORE_DURABILITY_AND_STACK_SIZE** - Ignore Quantity and Durability | | | | **IGNORE_STACK_SIZE** - Ignore quantity | | | | **TYPE_ONLY** - Item type only | |

player::has_privilege.desc:
**Name:** Has Permission\
**Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\
**Description:** Checks if a player has certain rights in the world.\
**Additional info:**\
  If the "Check Accuracy" marker is enabled, building and development permissions will be checked even if the player is whitelisted.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
if(player::has_privilege("BUILDER", "FALSE")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}

//Or dry by keywords

if(player::has_privilege(privilege="BUILDER", exact="FALSE")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

**Arguments:**

| ID             | Type                                                   | Description         |
| :-------- | :------------------------------------------------ | :------------- |
| privilege      | Marker                                                 | Right               |
|                | **BUILDER** - Builder                                  |                     |
|                | **BUILDER_AND_DEVELOPER** - Builder and Developer      |                     |
|                | **DEVELOPER** - Developer                              |                     |
|                | **OWNER** - World Owner                                |                     |
|                | **WHITELISTED** - Whitelisted                          |                     |
| exact          | Marker                                                 | Check Accuracy      |
|                | **FALSE** - Disable                                    |                     |
|                | **TRUE** - Enable                                      |                     |

player::has_room_for_item.desc:
**Name:** Has a Room For Item\ **Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\ **Description:** Checks if the player has room for one or more items in their inventory. **Usage example:** ```justcode if(player::has_room_for_item([item("stick"), item("stick")], "ARMOR", "ALL")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } //Or dry by keywords if(player::has_room_for_item(items=[item("stick"), item("stick")], checked_slots="ARMOR", check_mode="ALL")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :------------ | :------------------------------------ | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | items | Array\[Item\] | Items to Check
The argument supports list decomposition | | checked_slots | Marker | Checked Slots Mode | | | **ARMOR** - Armor | | | | **ENTIRE_INVENTORY** - All Inventory | | | | **HOTBAR** - Hot Bar | | | | **MAIN_INVENTORY** - Main Inventory | | | | **UPPER_INVENTORY** - Upper Inventory | | | check_mode | Marker | Check Item Mode | | | **ALL** - All Items | | | | **ANY** - Any Items | |

player::in_area.desc:
**Name:** Inside Region\
**Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\
**Description:** Checks if the player is in a certain region.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
if(player::in_area(location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), "FALSE", "HITBOX", "CONTAINS")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}

//Or dry by keywords

if(player::in_area(location_1=location(0,0,0,0,0), location_2=location(0,0,0,0,0), ignore_y_axis="FALSE", intersect_type="HITBOX", check_type="CONTAINS")){
    player::message("Condition is true");
}
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                  | Type                           | Description                 |
| :------------- | :------------------------ | :--------------------- |
| location_1          | Location                       | First corner of region      |
| location_2          | Location                       | Second Region Corner        |
| ignore_y_axis       | Marker                         | Ignore Y Axis               |
|                     | **FALSE** - Don't ignore       |                             |
|                     | **TRUE** - Ignore              |                             |
| intersect_type      | Marker                         | Intersection type           |
|                     | **HITBOX** - Hitbox            |                             |
|                     | **POINT** - Location           |                             |
| check_type          | Marker                         | Hitbox check type           |
|                     | **CONTAINS** - Contains        |                             |
|                     | **OVERLAPS** - Intersects      |                             |

player::holding.desc:
**Name:** Holding an Item\ **Action type:** Action that checks the conditions\ **Description:** Checks if the player is holding an item in their hands. **Usage example:** ```justcode if(player::holding([item("stick"), item("stick")], "EITHER_HAND", "EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } //Or dry by keywords if(player::holding(items=[item("stick"), item("stick")], hand_slot="EITHER_HAND", comparison_mode="EXACTLY")){ player::message("Condition is true"); } ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :-------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | items | Array\[Item\] | Items to Check
The argument supports list decomposition | | hand_slot | Marker | Hand | | | **EITHER_HAND** - Any hand | | | | **MAIN_HAND** - Main Hand | | | | **OFF_HAND** - Sub Hand | | | comparison_mode | Marker | Comparison Mode | | | **EXACTLY** - Full Comparison | | | | **IGNORE_DURABILITY_AND_STACK_SIZE** - Ignore Quantity and Durability | | | | **IGNORE_STACK_SIZE** - Ignore Quantity Only | | | | **TYPE_ONLY** - Item type only | |

| max            | Number                                                                                                               | creative_plus.action.if_variable_number_in_range.argument.max.name            |

The argument supports list decomposition | | position | Marker | Row Position | | | **BUTTON** - Add Row Below | | | | **TOP** - Add row to top | |

|                 | **HOTBAR** - Hot Bar             |                  |
|                 | **MAIN** - Main Inventory        |                  |
|                 | **UPPER** - Upper Inventory      |                  |

|                      | **TRUE** - True        |                      |

player::display_bell_ring.desc:
**Name:** Display Bell Ring\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays the Bell ringing animation.\
**Additional info:**\
  The "Down" direction stops the punch animation.\
**Work_with:**\
  Bell

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_bell_ring(location(0,0,0,0,0), "DOWN");

//Or from the object

location(0,0,0,0,0).display_bell_ring("DOWN");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_bell_ring(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), direction="DOWN");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID             | Type                   | Description        |
| :-------- | :---------------- | :------------ |
| location       | Location               | Bell location      |
| direction      | Marker                 | Direction          |
|                | **DOWN** - Down        |                    |
|                | **EAST** - East        |                    |
|                | **NORTH** - North      |                    |
|                | **SOUTH** - South      |                    |
|                | **WEST** - West        |                    |

player::display_block.desc:
**Name:** Display Block\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Display a block to a player without affecting other players. **Usage example:** ```justcode player::display_block([location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0)], "minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"); //Or dry by keywords player::display_block(location=[location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0)], block="minecraft:oak_log[axis=x]"); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :------- | :---------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------- | | location | Array\[Location\] | Block Location
The argument supports list decomposition | | block | Block | Block to display |

**Name:** Display End Gateway Beam Animation\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays an End Gateway beam animation at a specific location.

**Usage example:**

```justcode
//Or dry by keywords
```

|               | **LIGHT_PURPLE** - Light Purple      |                    |

player::display_hologram.desc:
**Name:** Display Hologram\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Shows the player a hologram. To remove a hologram at a location, leave the text blank.\
**Additional info:**\
  To wrap text on a new line, use "\n", eg \: "Line1\nLine2".

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_hologram(location(0,0,0,0,0), "text");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_hologram(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), text="text");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description            |
| :------- | :------- | :---------------- |
| location      | Location      | Hologram Location      |
| text          | Text          | Hologram Text          |

```justcode
//Or dry by keywords

player::display_lightning(location=location(0,0,0,0,0));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description                    |
| :------- | :------- | :------------------------ |

The argument supports list decomposition | | location | Array\[Location\] | Effect Location
The argument supports list decomposition |

player::display_particle_circle.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Circle\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Shows a player a circle out of particles with given parameters.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_circle(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, 2, 3, vector(0,0,0), "DEGREES");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_circle(particle=particle("fire"), center=location(0,0,0,0,0), radius=1, points=2, start_angle=3, perpendicular=vector(0,0,0), angle_unit="DEGREES");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                 | Type                       | Description                                                        |
| :------------ | :-------------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------ |
| particle           | Particle Effect            | Particle to show                                                   |
| center             | Location                   | Circle center                                                      |
| radius             | Number                     | Circle radius                                                      |
| points             | Number                     | Amount of points on the circle                                     |
| start_angle        | Number                     | Starting angle                                                     |
| perpendicular      | Vector                     | Normal of the plane to which the circle will be perpendicular      |
| angle_unit         | Marker                     | Angle type                                                         |
|                    | **DEGREES** - Degrees      |                                                                    |
|                    | **RADIANS** - Radians      |                                                                    |

player::display_particle_cube.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Cube\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays a particle cuboid to the player.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_cube(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, "HOLLOW");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_cube(particle=particle("fire"), first_corner=location(0,0,0,0,0), second_corner=location(0,0,0,0,0), spacing=1, type="HOLLOW");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                 | Type                           | Description        |
| :------------ | :------------------------ | :------------ |
| particle           | Particle Effect                | Particle           |
| first_corner       | Location                       | First corner       |
| second_corner      | Location                       | Second corner      |
| spacing            | Number                         | Spacing            |
| type               | Marker                         | Cuboid type        |
|                    | **HOLLOW** - Hollow            |                    |
|                    | **SOLID** - Solid              |                    |
|                    | **WIREFRAME** - Wireframe      |                    |

player::display_particle_line.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Line\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays a particle effect line to the player from the start location to the end location at a specified distance.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_line(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, "DISTANCE");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_line(particle=particle("fire"), start=location(0,0,0,0,0), end=location(0,0,0,0,0), divider=1, unit_of_measurement="DISTANCE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                       | Type                            | Description                         |
| :------------------ | :------------------------- | :----------------------------- |
| particle                 | Particle Effect                 | Particle Effect to Display          |
| start                    | Location                        | Start Location                      |
| end                      | Location                        | End Location                        |
| divider                  | Number                          | Number/Space Between Particles      |
| unit_of_measurement      | Marker                          | Particle Display Type               |
|                          | **DISTANCE** - By distance      |                                     |
|                          | **POINTS** - By Quantity        |                                     |

player::display_particle_ray.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Ray\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays a particle effect ray to the player from the starting location along the specified vector with the specified distance.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_ray(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), vector(0,0,0), 1, "DISTANCE");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_ray(particle=particle("fire"), start=location(0,0,0,0,0), ray=vector(0,0,0), divider=1, unit_of_measurement="DISTANCE");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                       | Type                            | Description                         |
| :------------------ | :------------------------- | :----------------------------- |
| particle                 | Particle Effect                 | Particle Effect to Display          |
| start                    | Location                        | Start Location                      |
| ray                      | Vector                          | Ray Direction                       |
| divider                  | Number                          | Number/Space Between Particles      |
| unit_of_measurement      | Marker                          | Particle Display Type               |
|                          | **DISTANCE** - By distance      |                                     |
|                          | **POINTS** - By Quantity        |                                     |

player::display_particle_sphere.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Sphere\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays a particle sphere to the player.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_sphere(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, 2);

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_sphere(particle=particle("fire"), center=location(0,0,0,0,0), radius=1, points=2);
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type                 | Description      |
| :------- | :-------------- | :---------- |
| particle      | Particle Effect      | Particle         |
| center        | Location             | Center           |
| radius        | Number               | Radius           |
| points        | Number               | Points           |

player::display_particle_spiral.desc:
**Name:** Display Particle Spiral\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays a particle spiral to the player.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_particle_spiral(particle("fire"), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, "DEGREES");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_particle_spiral(particle=particle("fire"), center=location(0,0,0,0,0), distance=1, radius=2, points=3, rotations=4, start_angle=5, angle_unit="DEGREES");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID               | Type                       | Description      |
| :---------- | :-------------------- | :---------- |
| particle         | Particle Effect            | Particle         |
| center           | Location                   | Center           |
| distance         | Number                     | Distance         |
| radius           | Number                     | Radius           |
| points           | Number                     | Points           |
| rotations        | Number                     | Rotations        |
| start_angle      | Number                     | Start Angle      |
| angle_unit       | Marker                     | Angle type       |
|                  | **DEGREES** - Degrees      |                  |
|                  | **RADIANS** - Radians      |                  |

player::display_pick_up_animation.desc:
**Name:** Show Pick Up Animation\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Shows the player a pickup animation.\
**Additional info:**\
  Essences that can be picked up can be items, experience orbs, and arrows.\
  This action works with any entity, not just the player.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_pick_up_animation("collected_name_or_uuid", "collector_name_or_uuid", 1);

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_pick_up_animation(collected_name_or_uuid="collected_name_or_uuid", collector_name_or_uuid="collector_name_or_uuid", amount=1);
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                          | Type        | Description                                     |
| :--------------------- | :----- | :----------------------------------------- |
| collected_name_or_uuid      | Text        | Name or UUID of the entity being picked up      |
| collector_name_or_uuid      | Text        | Name or UUID of the entity that picks up        |
| amount                      | Number      | Amount to pick up                               |

player::display_sign_text.desc:
**Name:** Display Sign Text\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Show the sign's text change to the player without changing its text for other players.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_sign_text(location(0,0,0,0,0), "line_1", "line_2", "line_3", "line_4", "ALL");

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_sign_text(location=location(0,0,0,0,0), line_1="line_1", line_2="line_2", line_3="line_3", line_4="line_4", side="ALL");
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type                                                                                         | Description                                                           |
| :------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------- |
| location      | Location                                                                                     | Sign location                                                         |
| line_1        | Text                                                                                         | First Sign Line                                                       |
| line_2        | Text                                                                                         | Second Sign Line                                                      |
| line_3        | Text                                                                                         | Third line of sign                                                    |
| line_4        | Text                                                                                         | Fourth Sign Line                                                      |
| side          | Marker                                                                                       | creative_plus.action.player_display_sign_text.argument.side.name      |
|               | **ALL** - creative_plus.action.player_display_sign_text.argument.side.enum.all.name          |                                                                       |
|               | **BACK** - creative_plus.action.player_display_sign_text.argument.side.enum.back.name        |                                                                       |
|               | **FRONT** - creative_plus.action.player_display_sign_text.argument.side.enum.front.name      |                                                                       |

player::display_vibration.desc:
**Name:** Display Vibration Particle\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Displays to the player a particle of vibration moving from one point to another.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::display_vibration(location(0,0,0,0,0), location(0,0,0,0,0), 1);

//Or dry by keywords

player::display_vibration(from=location(0,0,0,0,0), to=location(0,0,0,0,0), destination_time=1);
```

**Arguments:**

| ID                    | Type          | Description                    |
| :--------------- | :------- | :------------------------ |
| from                  | Location      | Starting Location              |
| to                    | Location      | Final Location                 |
| destination_time      | Number        | Destination time in ticks      |

player::dummy.desc:
**Name:** ...\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** ...

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::dummy();
```

player::expand_inventory_menu.desc:
**Name:** Expand Inventory Menu\ **Action type:** Action without value\ **Description:** Expands the player's opened inventory menu by the selected number of lines and populates it with the specified items. **Usage example:** ```justcode player::expand_inventory_menu([item("stick"), item("stick")], 1); //Or dry by keywords player::expand_inventory_menu(items=[item("stick"), item("stick")], size=1); ``` **Arguments:** | ID | Type | Description | | :---- | :------------ | :-------------------------------------------------------- | | items | Array\[Item\] | Items to Fill
The argument supports list decomposition | | size | Number | Number of rows to expand |

player::face_location.desc:
**Name:** Turn to Location\
**Action type:** Action without value\
**Description:** Turns the player towards the location.

**Usage example:**
```justcode
player::face_location(location(0,0,0,0,0));

//Or dry by keywords

player::face_location(location=location(0,0,0,0,0));
```

**Arguments:**

| ID            | Type          | Description      |
| :------- | :------- | :---------- |
| location      | Location      | Location         |
